channel.title: Services on Home
channel.description: Recent content in Services on Home

item.title: Data Modeling
item.description: We can do data modeling ,but our services are not limited.We also provide Mode metrics preparation. Model selection. Hyperparameter tuning. Model diagnostics. Prediction. Traditional and statistical modeling including regression. Machine learning. Optimization.

item.title: Data Visualization
item.description: We can make Dashboard with customized design. Interactive graphics. Reproducible report.

item.title: Data Wrangling
item.description: We can work with different sources of data and different types of data.

item.title: Services
item.description: The services provided by UNO Data Sciences group are Data Modeling We create data models at different levels to provide a comprehensive data architectural roadmap Data Wrangling We provide a sophisticated solution for cleaning and merging messy data sets for better analysis. Data Visualization We can transform your data into rich visuals that tells a "story",making complex data easier to grasp. Experimental design We can design experiments or survey based on your need and advise outcome based on the survey.
